greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest prime factor of 3-smooth numbers, with a(1)=1.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Reap[For[n = 1, n <= 2*10^5, n++, If[EulerPhi[6*n] == 2*n, Sow[ FactorInteger[n][[1, 1]]]]]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 02 2016 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 18 2003
